mapper.insert: insert into onlinebookstore.address (Uid, Areceivername, Aaddress, Acode, Aphone, Afixphone, Aprovince, Acity, Atown, Acheck) values (#{Uid}, #{Areceivername}, #{Aaddress}, #{Acode}, #{Aphone}, #{Afixphone}, #{Aprovince}, #{Acity}, #{Atown}, #{Acheck})
mapper.update: update onlinebookstore.address set Acheck= 0 where Uid=#{uid} and Acheck=1
update onlinebookstore.address set Acheck=1 where Aid=#{aid}
mapper.select: select Aid from onlinebookstore.address where Uid=#{uid} limit 1
